backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the CertiPrep AI backend, managing certifications, domains, objectives, questions, test results, flashcards, PDF progress, and user profiles with role-based access control and user approval mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming implementation of the full-page light/dark theme toggle in Layout.tsx, index.css, and tailwind.config.js with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of frontend source file paths to short summaries describing each page/component's purpose, covering practice, flashcards, study materials, dashboard, PDF viewer, layout, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS defining OKLCH-based CSS custom property tokens for both light (:root) and dark (.dark) themes, plus global border and background/text defaults.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the React app, mounting the root div and loading the main.tsx module script.
frontend/public/study-materials/comptia-: Static HTML study guide for CompTIA A+ (Core 1 & Core 2) with styled sections covering all exam domains, port references, CLI commands, exam tips, and memory aids.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that defines the TanStack Router route tree, mapping paths to Dashboard, CertificationSelector, StudyMode, QAPractice, Flashcards, PracticeTest, and StudyMaterials pages within a shared Layout.
frontend/src/components/FlashcardDeck.ts: Reusable flashcard component with flip animation, progress indicator, and correct/incorrect action buttons that appear after the card is revealed.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout wrapper component providing a sticky header with navigation links, dark/light theme toggle (persisted to localStorage), and a responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/PDFViewer.tsx: Modal PDF/HTML viewer component that tracks and persists reading scroll progress per certification using debounced backend calls, with support for restoring saved scroll position.
frontend/src/components/VoiceControls.ts: UI component for text-to-speech and speech recognition controls, exposing voice settings (voice selection, rate, pitch), a mic toggle for voice input, and a speaking/listening status bar.
frontend/src/data/certifications.ts: Static data file defining TypeScript interfaces and a detailed array of CompTIA certification objects, each containing exam metadata and domain-level objectives, key terms, ports, protocols, and study notes.
frontend/src/data/studyMaterials.ts: Static data file mapping CompTIA certifications to their associated HTML study guide file paths, descriptions, and display metadata such as color and exam code.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and caches an Internet Computer backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) based on the current identity, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating flashcards, questions, test results, and reading progress via the backend actor.
Custom hook wrapping the Web Speech Recognition API to provide start/stop listening, transcript state, and interim results.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechSynthesis.ts: Custom hook wrapping the Web Speech Synthesis API with voice selection, rate/pitch controls, markdown stripping, and speak/stop functions.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Inter and Fira Code fonts, defining Tailwind CSS layers with light/dark mode CSS variables, and utility component classes for certification badge colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/CertificationSelector: Page component displaying a grid of CompTIA certification cards (A+, Security+, Network+, etc.) with metadata and navigation links to study tools.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard page displaying a grid of CompTIA certification cards, each showing badge, difficulty, exam code, and the user's latest test score fetched via `useGetTestResults`.
frontend/src/pages/Flashcards.tsx: Implements a three-phase (setup, study, review) flashcard study session for a given certification, supporting generating new cards or loading saved ones, tracking correct/incorrect answers, and persisting cards via `useAddFlashcard`.
frontend/src/pages/PracticeTest.tsx: Provides a timed (30-minute) multiple-choice practice test for a certification with setup, test, submitting, and results phases, auto-generating at least 20 questions and saving scores via `useSubmitTestResult`.
frontend/src/pages/QAPractice.tsx: Offers an untimed Q&A quiz mode for a certification with optional domain filtering, showing immediate per-question feedback and a final review summary with pass/fail filtering.
frontend/src/pages/StudyMaterials.tsx: Displays a grid of CompTIA certification study material cards with reading progress indicators, and opens a `PDFViewer` component when a material is selected, tracking progress per certification.
frontend/src/pages/StudyMode.tsx: A React page component that implements an AI-powered study chat interface where users can ask questions about certification exam domains and receive contextual instructor-style responses. It supports text and voice input/output, domain selection, and renders formatted messages in a scrollable chat window.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both standard query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration that sets up dark mode via class, extends the theme with oklch-based CSS variable color tokens, custom fonts, border radii, and box shadows, and registers the animate, typography, and container-queries plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata file tracking the CertiPrep AI project's version, existing features, and a pending feature request for a full-page light/dark theme toggle with localStorage persistence.
